statements: SELECT * FROM employees
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01'
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employees WHERE certification_id = 123
SELECT employee_id, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT'
SELECT certification_id, completion_date FROM employees WHERE completion_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT certification_id, certification_name, completion_date FROM employees WHERE certification_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department='IT' ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM certifications;
SELECT certification_name, employee_id, certification_date FROM certifications WHERE certification_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;

SELECT employee_name, certification_name, certification_date FROM employees JOIN certifications ON employees.employee_id = certifications.employee_id WHERE certifications.certification_name = 'Project Management';
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT employee_name, training_name, trainer_name FROM employees JOIN certifications ON employees.employee_id = certifications.employee_id JOIN training ON training.training_name = certifications.certification_name;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department, E.hire_date, C.certification_name FROM employees E JOIN certifications C ON E.employee_id = C.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, training_name, trainer_name FROM employees JOIN training ON employees.employee_id = training.training_id WHERE training_location = 'New York';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_certifications, employee_id FROM certifications GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_certifications > 2;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT e.name, t.course_name, et.completion_date FROM employees e JOIN employee_training et ON e.id = et.employee_id JOIN training t ON t.training_id = et.training_id;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01';

SELECT training.course_name, training.start_date, training.end_date, employees.name FROM training JOIN employee_training ON training.training_id = employee_training.training_id JOIN employees ON employee_training.employee_id = employees.id;
SELECT employees.name, certifications.certification_name, certifications.issue_date FROM employees LEFT JOIN certifications ON employees.id = certifications.employee_id;

SELECT employees.name, employees.department, training.course_name FROM employees JOIN employee_training ON employees.id = employee_training.employee_id JOIN training ON employee_training.training_id = training.training_id ORDER BY employees.department, training.course_name DESC;

SELECT employees.name, certifications.certification_name, training.course_name FROM employees JOIN certifications ON employees.id = certifications.employee_id JOIN employee_training ON employees.id = employee_training.employee_id JOIN training ON employee_training.training_id = training.training_id WHERE certifications.issue_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department;

SELECT employee_name, training_name, certification_name FROM employees JOIN training ON employees.employee_id = training.employee_id JOIN certifications ON employees.employee_id = certifications.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC, hire_date DESC;
SELECT training_name, training_date, employees.employee_name FROM training INNER JOIN employees ON training.employee_id = employees.employee_id;

SELECT certification_name, certification_date, manager_name FROM certifications INNER JOIN employees ON certifications.employee_id = employees.employee_id INNER JOIN managers ON employees.employee_id = managers.manager_id;
SELECT department_name, manager_name FROM departments INNER JOIN managers ON departments.manager_id = managers.manager_id ORDER BY manager_name DESC;
